Parameters: int: the minimum capacity, between 1 and 2^30 inclusive
CircularArray(int).Description: Creates a circular array with capacity for at least minCapacity elements.

Returns: Number of elements in the CircularArray.
size().Description: Get number of elements in the CircularArray.

getFirst().Description: Get first element of the CircularArray.

CircularArray().Description: Creates a circular array with default capacity.

addLast(E).Description: Add an element at end of the CircularArray.

Parameters: int: Number of elements to remove.
removeFromStart(int).Description: Remove multiple elements from front of the CircularArray, ignore when numOfElements is less than or equals to 0.

clear().Description: Remove all elements from the CircularArray.

getLast().Description: Get last element of the CircularArray.

addFirst(E).Description: Add an element in front of the CircularArray.

Parameters: int: Number of elements to remove.
removeFromEnd(int).Description: Remove multiple elements from end of the CircularArray, ignore when numOfElements is less than or equals to 0.

Parameters: int: The zero based element index in the CircularArray.
Throws: ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException} if n < 0 or n >= size().
get(int).Description: Get nth (0 <= n <= size()-1) element of the CircularArray.

popLast().Description: Remove last element from end of the CircularArray and return it.

popFirst().Description: Remove first element from front of the CircularArray and return it.

ClassDesc: CircularArray is a generic circular array data structure that provides O(1) random read, O(1) prepend and O(1) append. The CircularArray automatically grows its capacity when number of added items is over its capacity.
